info.description:
## Summary 
Serves as the single point of issuance for physical financial documents on behalf of the user. 
- Examples include invoices, credit memos, and receipts. 
 - Records billing information and communicates with the general ledger.
 
---
## Platform Service Dependencies
#### ACCOUNTING
- **journal entry** (POST) 
 *A journal entry is posted when an invoice or payment is recorded.* 
- **account** (GET) 
 *Accounts are retrieved in order to display the account names for accounts used within Charges.* 

#### CUSTOMER
- **account** (GET) 
 *Retrieves customer data to build a customer invoice.* 

#### DOCUMENT
- **document** (GET) 
 *Retrieves PDF document and branding files to use during the generation of customer invoices.* 
- **document** (POST) 
 *Stores a copy of a customer invoice and retains reference to the generated PDF invoice.* 

#### POLICY
- **policy** (GET) 
 *Retrieves policy data to filter decide applicable charges, amounts and accounting actions to perform for a given policy.* 

#### PRODUCT
- **product** (GET) 
 *Retrieves product in order to describe premium charges on an invoice.* 

#### RENDER
- **document** (POST) 
 *Renders the customer invoice.* 

---
## Platform Events Consumed
#### ACCOUNTING
- **journal** (DELETED) 
 *When a journal is deleted the charges are all marked as deleted as the account for those charges were deleted along with the journal* 
- **journal** (CREATED) 
 *When a journal is created default charges, such as the premium charge, are created under the same context as the journal using accounts from that journal.* 

---
## Platform Data Replications
#### POLICY
- **policy** (SYNC) 
 *Replicates policy data needed for premium line item descriptions* 

#### ACCOUNTING
- **journal** (SYNC) 
 *Replicates journal information in order to decide when ACCRUAL VS CASH Accounting is in order.* 

---
info.title: Invoice Service

tags.name: Charge
tags.description: A charge represents a definition of a service to be purchased.

tags.name: Settings
tags.description: Settings regarding invoices and the general invoicing process.

tags.name: Invoice
tags.description: Manage Internal Billing Invoices representing a list of charges to be paid.

tags.name: Payment
tags.description: A record indicating a payment provided against an invoice or group of invoices.

parameters.description: The Charge to be created

get.summary: Retrieve a list of all Charges applicable to a Policy
get.description:
Retrieves a paged list of all Charges sorted by Created On in descending order that could apply to the Policy. The Charge list is filtered based on Policy information and only Active Charges that have matching information are returned. 

Current Policy filter criteria: billingType

parameters.name: settings
parameters.description: New settings values

country.description: The country name component. When specified, the value MUST be in ISO 3166-1 'alpha-2' code format [ISO3166]

formatted.example:
100 Universal City Plaza
Hollywood, CA 91608 USA
formatted.description: The full mailing address, formatted for display or use with a mailing label. This attribute MAY contain newlines.

postalCode.description: The zip code or postal code component.

region.description: The state, province or region component. Administrative division, within a country; a state or province.

streetAddress.description: The main street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box.

streetAddress2.description: The second line of a full address. The unit, apartment, building, etc. any secondary address component.

editStatus.description: Whether or not you are allowed to edit this charge amount after it has been applied

type.description: Whether the amount is a percent of the policy premium or flat value

entityId.description: The entity id portion of the context this charge was saved under.

amount.description: The details for the amount of the charge.

billType.description: Whether this Charge id applied to an Agency billed item or a Direct billed item

chargeType.description: The type of the charge. Can only be created as type FEE, but system created charges could be of type PREMIUM.

commissionType.description: Which group(s) should receive a commission for this Charge

creditAccountId.description: Unique Contextual ID of the Credit Account.

debitAccountId.description: Unique Contextual ID of the Debit Account.

isSystemCharge.description: Indicates whether the charge is a system charge or user-created.

paidTo.description: The place the Charge id paid to

priority.description: The suggested priority for adding this Charge to an invoice. Defaults to LOW

status.description: Describes whether the Charge id currently in use

title.description: A descriptive name for the Charge

updatedOn.description: When the Charge was last modified.

isArchived.description: Boolean that denotes if the Charge has been archived.

tenantId.description: ID of the Tenant in which the resource is stored

entityId.description: ID of the Entity in which the resource is stored

id.description: Unique ID of the Customer Invoice.

invoiceId.description: Unique ID of the Invoice associated with this Customer Invoice.

documentId.description: ID of the document on Document service.

versionId.description: ID of the Document version on Document service.

renderedOn.description: When the Customer Invoice was rendered.

createdOn.description: When the Customer Invoice was created.

updatedOn.description: When the Customer Invoice was last modified.

CustomerInvoiceV1.description: Customer Invoice describes relation between Invoice and generated PDF document.

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

policyNumber.description: Number of related policy to invoice.

id.description: Unique ID of the Invoice Contact.

invoiceId.description: Unique ID of the Invoice which the Contact is tied to.

streetAddress.description: The main street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box.

streetAddress2.description: The second line of a full address. The unit, apartment, building, etc. any secondary address component.

state.description: The state, province or region component. Administrative division, within a country; a state or province.

postalCode.description: The zip code or postal code component.

createdOn.description: When the Invoice Contact was created.

updatedOn.description: When the Invoice Contact was last modified.

address.description: The preferred address, which includes street address, locality, region, etc.

id.description: Unique ID of the Invoice Line Item.

invoiceId.description: Unique ID of the Invoice which the Line Item is tied to.

chargeId.description: The contextual ID of the charge associated with this line item.

amount.description: Amount for this Invoice Line Item.

description.description: Description of the Invoice Line Item. The Description cannot be empty.

dateRangeDescription.description: If applicable this will contain a string representation of the effective and expiration date of the policy for this line item.

memo.description: When the Invoice Line Item was updated.

createdOn.description: When the Invoice Line Item was created.

updatedOn.description: When the Invoice Line Item was updated.

InvoiceLineItemV1.description: An Invoice Line Item describes individual actions or items that have an assigned cost being billed.

displayLogo.description: Configuration to determine if logo should be displayed on invoice

logoId.description: ID of the logo, which will be displayed on invoice

showAgencyDetails.description: Configuration to determine if agency name and address should be shown on invoice

isMainOffice.description: Configuration to determine if main or customer offices and addresses were chosen to show on invoice

groupLineItems.description: Configuration to determine if to group line items into the premium amount or to show line items

allowDescriptionEdit.description: Configuration to determine if user can edit policy description on invoices

paymentDueDateSelection.description: Configuration to determine if day of year or day of month was chosen on settings form

paymentDueDateDays.description: Amount of days before due date

allowAdditionalCharges.description: Configuration to determine if user can bundle additional charges

invoiceDefaultNote.description: Default note at bottom of invoice

InvoiceSettingsV1.description: The settings used by invoice service to configure invoices

policyId.description: Unique ID of the Policy associated with this Invoice.

amount.description: Invoice Amount, as the sum of all Line Items.

currencyCode.description: The Currency Code for the Invoice. The Currency Code cannot be shorter or longer than 3 letters and cannot contain any special characters, symbols, or numbers.

invoiceNumber.description: Auto-incremented, Invoice number is created as date plus customer number plus number of invoices created.

notes.example: This is an example of a note the user left on the invoice.

amountDue.description: Invoice Amount Due is Invoice Amount minus sum of all Invoice Payments.

updatedOn.description: When the Invoice was last modified.

invoiceContact.description: A Contact associated with the Invoice.

lineItems.description: A List of Line Items associated with the Invoice.

InvoiceV1.description: An Invoice describes a collection of or single monetary debt(s) in need of payment or to be paid.

lateFees.description: The late fees object, will be null if late fees are off

createdOn.description: When late fees setting was created

updatedOn.description: When late fees setting was last updated

LateFeeSettingsV1.description: The settings used by invoice service to handle late fees on invoices and receipts.

dayCount.description: The number of days before a late fee is applied to past-due invoice. Must be between 1 and 365

balance.description: The minimum balance to apply a late fee towards a past-due invoice.

memo.description: The memo to apply to any late fees applied, maximum 1000 characters

calculationType.description: The calculation type to use. Can be either FLAT or PERCENT

fee.description: The minimum fee to set for a late invoice.

percentage.description: The percentage to apply to calculate a fee for a late invoice. Only used on PERCENT calculation

method.description: The method of paging that this pagingInfo contains

numberOfElements.description: The number of data elements in this response.

page.description: The page number of the response.

pageSize.description: The page size of this response.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages, based on the pageSize and totalElements

relatedObjects.description: A map of different kinds of objects related to the response. Each key in the map is a type of object that is referenced from the content of the response, e.g. a User or an Entity. Each value of the map is itself a map, but of the objects' IDs to the objects themselves so as to allow looking each object up via the ID that was provided in the content.

remainingDue.description: Amount which still should be paid.

amountPaid.description: Amount which was paid after record the payment.

PaymentInvoiceV1.description: Payment Invoices represent relation between Invoices and Payments which were made.

id.description: Unique ID of the Payment Method.

paymentPriority.description: The type of payment priority to set, can be either be SPLIT or OLDEST

methods.description: Payment Methods represent combination of payment methods, which were applied to current Payment.

invoices.description: Payment Invoices represent relation between Invoices and Payments which were made.
